name: The Ziff Who Came to Dinner
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Dan Castellaneta, Deb Lacusta, Daniel Chun (staff writer)
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Artie Ziff is discovered hiding out in the Simpsons' attic.
